item.description:
Our neighbors, the Hartford Heights Tall Club, are celebrating their anniversary on Sunday.

Please join us to celebrate the 19th Anniversary of the founding of our club - Hartford Heights Tall Club
With a day at Foxwoods Resort & Casino
Take a chance at having a day of fun - with good food, good friends, good locale.
(…We’re betting you’ll enjoy it!)

Order of events:
• 8:00 AM meet outside the Bingo Hall (for those who will be playing) to reserve places in the non-smoking room
• 8:30 AM meet at Seasons Buffet for Breakfast (If you are not playing bingo, you can just arrive now.)
• 10:30 AM Bingo begins or
For those not interested in Bingo, check out the rest of the casino or the spa.
Spa services may require reservations at the Foxwood website.
Or check the entertainment listings for the day at the Foxwood website.

Cost: Bingo $20 per person
Breakfast $10 per person
Spa and entertainment prices vary
item.name: Anniversary Event, Breakfast and Bingo at Foxwoods
